p: The choriocarcinoma cell lines (JEG-3, ATCC ® HTB-36 TM) and African green monkey kidney epithelial cells (Vero, ATCC ® CCL-81 TM) were cultured in a minimum essential medium (MEM, Gibco) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS, HyClone), 1% L-glutamine and 1% penicillin/streptomycin (P/S, Gibco). The immortalized human brain capillary endothelial cell line hCMEC/D3 (SCC066, Merck) was cultured in the EndoGRO TM-MV Complete Media Kit (Merck). The Vero E6 cell line was cultured in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM, Gibco) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum and 1% penicillin/streptomycin. All cells were incubated at 37°C with 5% CO 2.
